website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S3 is the most powerful Android tablet available, but it's very pricey for the functionality you get.
cons: Android doesn't match Windows on productivity

customer_reviews.title: Great, but European charger from .co.uk purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The device is beautiful, and I cannot wait to get using it properly. But as this was bought from the official Amazon system, on the .co.uk site, I would have hoped it would have come to be with a UK Power Charger. Instead it came to me with a European Charger, and started up in German. The latter is not an issue, but I wish the components were changable. I now have a Useless European charger, and will have to keep swapping with my phone adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive
customer_reviews.text: Thinner and lighter than my old, very expensive at the time, tablet. Better screen, excellent detail and colour. Battery has run 3 days on first charge; a busy 3 days with updates and set up. It has Android 8 Oreo. I have given it 4 stars as it could be improved but would be a lot more expensive like an S4.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Delamare

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to setup the basic settings needed to start using this, but the initial language was in Portuguese, however that was the first option to change. Also the pin tool to open the SD card tray was plastic and bent so had to use a sowing pin. As other people have said it works with a 256gb micro SD card. The pen provided works fine and saves fingerprints on screen. Also it comes with a UK charger plug along with the European one. Charges very quickly on mains socket too.
customer_reviews.author: Karlk

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Love it, havent put it down since ive got it. Obviously its expensive for a tablet but it is very good and the S pen is very responsive and accurate
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Wardman

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: The tablet is very fast and responsive, I haven't used the pen much but it worked perfectly when I did. Tablets have always been on the expensive side compared to other technology but this tablet is more than capable of running typical apps with no sluggishness, the picture is bright and really good quality. Save yourself a few hundred pounds and pick this tablet over its more expensive counterparts.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as iPad.9.7
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is not as good as the iPad ..the battery is no where near as good ..and find I have to press icons a number of times before apps open .. I’ve had this device less than a year . It’s slow full of glitches and virtually unusable ..total waste of money . If you want quality get Apple iPad ..not this crap .
customer_reviews.author: tvas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I really love my S3. The screen and build quality is great and this thing is ideal studying (duolingo, lingodeer etc..) which is predominantly what I use it for. You can also create art on it with Medibang paint which is free. Is it as good as the Apple equivalent? probably not, but for the price it is going for now it's a very decent tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Customer

customer_reviews.title: An expensive piece of rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Have to stand next to router to get a connection, chrome keeps crashing and the s-pen doesn't always work.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying it very much, particularly the drawing ability
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet, it plays my app game very well, the screen seems very sensitive and I love the pen and the drawing program that it comes with - I'm making some lovely art, great to doodle away with. No probs so far, I really appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Sara Arrowsmith

customer_reviews.title: Very neat tablet
customer_reviews.text: Just got it so unsure on battery life as yet. Very neat. Having a few teething problems getting Excel to work, and email to work on outlook, but no doubt I'll get there.
customer_reviews.author: Aunty Y

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product does all the things that you would expect plus some
customer_reviews.author: John Murray of Lowestoft

customer_reviews.title: Password
customer_reviews.text: Found it a bit harder to use, but getting used to it now, the only anoying thing is every time it is switched off i have to put in the password and I can't find a way to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: denise gallop

customer_reviews.title: tab s3
customer_reviews.text: very happy with s3 tab nice size easy to use and quick
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: As if it was bought from a shop. No issues what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected and very very good tablet all round !
customer_reviews.author: Sohail

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This Tab even though it took me asking for help was easy to use and arrived by the due date.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron M Page

customer_reviews.title: The Golden Tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the wife so she can use it for doing digital art - she's been quiet as a church mouse since.
customer_reviews.author: James Teare

customer_reviews.title: GOOD SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Great communication ,,,arrived early ,,,, no issues ,,, great tablet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Paid for next day delivery and arrived before 1pm the day after order. Well packaged and secure. High quality Samsung product (which you would expect). Sound and graphics are amazing, fast to load web pages and run apps. Writing feature is excellent and it has even managed to decode my spider handwriting! Exceptionally pleased with the S3. Is it worth the price? Depends on the individual and what the want / need from a tablet. For me, slightly over priced but then I don't use all the features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A really good tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I have had every Tab S that's been available. They really are amazing pieces of kit. I bought this Tab S3 with the sim card slot. And yes you can make phone calls with the S3 without any extra software. I love it, it goes with me everywhere. I know that the S4 is now out, but I want to get the most out of my S3 before considering upgrading. Samsung really do deliver the best electronic products out there. Thank you Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Happy but not the coloure I ordred.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the tablet as it alloued me to do my Drawing thanks to the awsome S Pen. Only i Ordred it in "Silber" and it came as the Black not a huge issue as the product works fine and is in a case but just a bit odd.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: The tablet is amazing beautiful fast and powerful the reason for the 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: The tablet is amazing beautiful fast and powerful the reason for the 3 stars is in the picture it's silver I wanted the silver one so that's why I chose this one but they sent me a black one but can't be bothered to send it bk for a swap as it's still a stunning tablet but you should be more clear in your description
customer_reviews.author: steve barnes

customer_reviews.title: The 4g feature  is brilliant, allowing it to be used as a PHONE.
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet but would like it better if they Made an 8 inch version.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mik K.

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far this is all I require in a tablet. Lightweight, easy to use, love the graphics, however, I'm not a game player, only used to watch video and internet. Sound system pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: brenda kent

customer_reviews.title: A great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I've always had Apple phones and tablets and wasn't a fan of the older Samsung tablet owned by my husband. This has changed my mind! The speed, the quality of the graphics and sound and the ease of use all trump my 2016 iPad. So far I have used it for taking notes, gaming, playing music and social media/ general surfing and it is frankly awesome. I've bought a keyboard which works seamlessly and the pen is a great addition. If there is one niggle, it's that the fingerprint identification is a bit fiddly, but it works fine. All in all a very impressive piece of kit!
customer_reviews.author: Baytree Cottage

customer_reviews.title: Slick tablet that performs
customer_reviews.text: After having an iPad 4th gen I decided I wanted a good android tablet and this Samsung galaxy tab S3 hasn't disappointed. It is fast, no stuttering very responsive and very easy to use, the screen is simply stunning. The fast charge really makes a huge difference, my iPad took forever to fully charge no such problem with the Samsung. Only negative I can think of is it's not cheap but it is very impressive and in this case I think you do get what you pay for. Oh I got mine direct from the Samsung website as it was cheaper than Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for all of your office and home needs
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure if I would get the use from a tablet as I have a Galaxy S7, but after a few hours of using this it is my go to device in the house or office. This is the first time I have used the S pen, and it is great for taking notes, drawing and there are a few colouring apps I have used. With the 4 speakers and AMOLED display I enjoyed streaming videos while travelling and it didn't feel like I had to squint my eyes. The look and feel is familiar as I am use to a Samsung phone, but it is easy to pick up if you haven't used a Android phone before.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer, good after sale customer service
customer_reviews.text: For a present so not used yet, although have checked it's working & connected to our wifi. Looks great, & does have both EU charger & UK charger inside the box. Does have a UK warranty as double checked before ordering. Wrong colour was sent, but customer service was fast & efficient at rectifying the problem & offering me a choice of resolutions. Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have to say the tab s3 is one of the best tablets ive had in a long time. The graphics are excellent along with the battery life no charging every few hours. the s pen excellent no longer trying to to type with chubby fingers getting the wrong letters. I am very impressed and would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Baker

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Well I'm new to the Samsung tablets as I'm used to using an IPad. I must say I have been very impressed with this product and I especially love the fact that you can draw on it. It took me a while to get used to everything but it was easy to set up and I'm getting used to the layout. Think I've been converted.
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about my Tab S3. Had it from new when it 1st came out, replacing my really slow big S2. My 4 year old grand daughter loves drawing and colouring on here. Don't know what I will do if it breaks, perhaps buy a spare one while cheap. I also love my Galaxy S9+ 256gb. 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Bizzybquik

customer_reviews.title: Best Android tablet by far
customer_reviews.text: The screen is amazing, it's fast and it's very powerful. Very light and the S pen is a dream. The S pen will magnetically stick to the side of the tablet, but don't rely on this if you are going out. Buy a case that has a pen holder with it. I can't fault it. Pricey yes, but this is a tablet that should last years.
customer_reviews.author: JD

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy tab S3 T820 24,6 cm (9.7 inch) Tablet-PC silber
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:silber| Style Name:LteAll-new glass design
For the first time, enjoy the sleekness of a smartphone with all the benefits of a tablet. The glossy glass back of the Galaxy Tab S3 provides a premium look that also feels premium in your hands. Feast your eyes
When it comes to your viewing experience, the brighter the better. The Galaxy Tab S3's screen provides bright and colorful images, and with HDR video playback capabilities, you'll get a true-to-life view that pulls you into the content. Upgrade your view
From games to movies, the Galaxy Tab S3 offers a quality visual experience. Inside the tablet is a Snapdragon 820 processor that sets a new standard for CPU and GPU performance. Plus, the Vulkan graphics take your gaming to a whole new world, while HDR video support makes the scene come alive. Four speakers, fantastic sound
The Galaxy Tab S3's quad-speaker system has sound coming from each corner, automatically following the direction mode of the screen. So you'll hear every note whether you hold it horizontal or vertical. Galaxy Tab S3
We collaborated with AKGs skilled sound engineers to provide clear, crisp and high quality AKG sound that immerses you in the experience. Game on
The Galaxy Game Launcher has been optimized for Galaxy Tab S3's screen, offering Power Saver mode, Game Broadcasting, and Mute Games and Ongoing Calls mode. Add in the exciting graphics of the Vulkan API capabilities and the myriad games available in the Galaxy Game Pack for non-stop fun. Write naturally
The new, redesigned S Pen feels and writes just like your favorite ballpoint, plus it doesn't need recharging. Measuring 9.4 mm in diameter, it ensures a stable, comfortable grip. And we've narrowed the tip to 0.7 mm, for the clearest, most natural handwriting yet. Not just any pen
The pen is mightier with S Pen-specific

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars794 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK
